targets.query: SELECT derivative(mean("connections"),1s)  FROM "mysql" WHERE host =~ /$server$/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(none)
SELECT derivative(mean("threads_connected"),1s)   FROM "mysql" WHERE host =~ /$server$/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(none)

list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "mysql" WITH KEY=host
